remarks: Trace joined with trace of composition.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2013.)
statement:
trljco.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
trljco.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trljco.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trljco.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trljco $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ G e. T ) -> ( ( R ` F ) .\/ ( R ` ( F o. G ) ) ) = ( ( R ` F ) .\/ ( R ` G ) ) ) $.
